page.title: 15Evenwood Working Mens Club
page.content: Evenwood club is a very popular place for social life in the village.It consists of a mens bar which opens afternoons and nights,a lounge for men and women and to have a quiet night,a games room.Which provides 1 snooker table ,2 pool tables,a dartboard or dominoes.The concert room provides entertainment to suit most people, dancing,bingo,concerts,parties plus groups.No one under 18 is allowed on the premises unless a private wedding party is booked or the childrens Xmas parties.There is a functions room for special meetings & committee rooms for the officials.The club have 2 trips away every year ,one for the aged people and one for the children.To join the club a membership fee must be payed yearly.
